title: Etiqa Full Phone Protection
content:
#### ADVISORY: Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible. ## Articles in this section - [Etiqa Full Phone Protection](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543357767321-Etiqa-Full-Phone-Protection) - [Etiqa Phone Screen Protection](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543931946137-Etiqa-Phone-Screen-Protection) - [Express Send Scam Insurance](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/18323082557465-Express-Send-Scam-Insurance) - [GCash Card Protect](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/22690937303833-GCash-Card-Protect) - [GInsure Online Shopping Protect Insurance](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/12982084012441-GInsure-Online-Shopping-Protect-Insurance) - [PGA Sompo Online Shopping Insurance](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15544182259865-PGA-Sompo-Online-Shopping-Insurance) ## Promoted articles - [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account) - [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification) - [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account) Etiqa Full Phone Protection is a financial plan that offers protection from accidental and liquid damage to your mobile phone. Jump to - [Coverage](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543357767321-Etiqa-Full-Phone-Protection#h_01H4JBSYCGHAAQJ639JDNATKKF) - [Eligibility](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543357767321-Etiqa-Full-Phone-Protection#h_01H4JBT5GJY1QNW9WHF9RGSW3P) - [Purchase Etiqa Full Phone Protection](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543357767321-Etiqa-Full-Phone-Protection#h_01H4JBTB6NAB61E4F20D41HQ5M) - [Claims](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543357767321-Etiqa-Full-Phone-Protection#h_01H4JBTFRB7T0AK5TBY1AMG4GC) - [Cancellation](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543357767321-Etiqa-Full-Phone-Protection#h_01H4JBTM4W9EVJVJBGXVNNFV05) - [Contact Etiqa](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543357767321-Etiqa-Full-Phone-Protection#h_01H4JBTRR5Z3VQME3ZPKP87P6N) ## Coverage Your coverage under this insurance product will include the following: - Accidental damage (unexpected damage due to phone drop) - Liquid damage - Screen damage ## Eligibility You can buy this product for your own mobile device as long as it was purchased within 18 months with no existing damage/s. You can own multiple policies, but you can only have one policy per device within a coverage period. ## Purchase Etiqa Full Phone Protection **Note**:Â You cannot buy this policy for someone else. You cannot upgrade your current policy. **![How_do_I_apply_for_Etiqa_Full_Phone_Protection.jpg](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/15599591325593)** ## Claims To claim the benefits of your insurance, please make sure that your policy is activated and prepare the following details: - Date of damage - Place of damage - Narration and description of damage - Photos of damage **Filing a claim** Step 1: Go to your policy page and tap **File a claim** Step 2: Provide the required details Step 3: Tap **Submit** **Note:** The computation of the reimbursement/claim amount to be received is based on the payment plan you have selected upon purchase. | | | | --- | --- | | **Annual Payment** | **![Full_Phone__1.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/20330460727833)**
\*minimum of PHP 500 | | **Monthly Payment** | ![Full_Phone__2.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/20330460731801)
\*minimum of PHP 500
\*\*no. of months paid - annual premium | Below is a sample computation: **Plan 21 - Monthly Payment Plan** ![Full_Phone__3.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/20330522640665) ## Cancellation You can request for cancellation of your policy within 24 to 48 hours upon purchase. Cancellation requests beyond the given timeframe will be subject for further investigation and approval. ## Contact Etiqa You may contact Etiqa via: **Phone No.:** (02) 8890-1758 **Email:** customersupport@etiqa.com.ph **Facebook Messenger:** @etiqaphilippines [Previous](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543357767321-Etiqa-Full-Phone-Protection#) [Next](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543931946137-Etiqa-Phone-Screen-Protection) Etiqa Phone Screen Protection - [Etiqa Full Phone Protection](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543357767321-Etiqa-Full-Phone-Protection) - [Etiqa Phone Screen Protection](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15543931946137-Etiqa-Phone-Screen-Protection) - [Express Send Scam Insurance](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/18323082557465-Express-Send-Scam-Insurance) - [GCash Card Protect](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/22690937303833-GCash-Card-Protect) - [GInsure Online Shopping Protect Insurance](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/12982084012441-GInsure-Online-Shopping-Protect-Insurance) - [PGA Sompo Online Shopping Insurance](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15544182259865-PGA-Sompo-Online-Shopping-Insurance) 15543357767321 Back to Top
